articles.title: When Architectural Thinking Opens the Door to React ⚛️
articles.description: An article that I share my personal journey of realizing how WebDev and Architecture share the same Modular Thinking and more. 🧩 Have a look and feel free to share your comments!

articles.title: 🌱 Reflecting on an Incredible Year of Growth, Learning, and New Beginnings 🎉
articles.description: An article about my reflection on 2024 from becoming a mom to joining a 24-week web development bootcamp! Balancing family, coding, and learning has been challenging yet deeply rewarding.❤️🌱💪🏻
